entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for Android queryProductDetails #9034
  • BlazorWebview System.ArgumentException: The path is empty. (Parameter 'relativeTo') MacCatalyst #9032
  • Bug in .NET MAUI Entry View for Android #9031
  • Label, wrapping text, doesn't center. #9030
  • AppIcons and Splash Screens Do Not Render Correctly on Physical Devices #9029
  • CollectionView does not resize when items becomes invisible #9023
  • Sign In with Apple Web Authenticator for Mac Catalyst #9021

Closed

  • FlexLayout provides space for invisible children #7408
  • Labels added in code are not displayed on Android #8395
  • ScrollView does not handle rotation well #8447
    6.0-sr3
  • RowDefinitions is now mandatory (was optional in Forms) #8958
  • [Enhancement] Handle null/empty PropertyName in the INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged event #1111
    6.0-sr5
  • TextColor does not work correctly in Windows for the Picker and DatePicker. #7924
    6.0-sr5
  • [WPF] BlazorWebview in Transparent WPF window is non interactable #9024

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect installed workloads #9033
  • Bump Markdig from 0.22.1 to 0.23.0 #9026
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.Memory from 4.5.4 to 4.5.5 #9025
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.4.1.2 to 2.5.0 #8981
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Handle null/empty PropertyName in the INPC.PropertyChanged event #8418
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9018
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Use $(_MauiDotNetTfm) instead of hardcoded net6.0 #9016
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Generate AOT Profilers for Non Shell based apps #8941
  • [Android] Avoid create an unnecessary dialog in DatePickerHandler #8561
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-servicing
  • Unit tests for FlexLayoutManager #6800
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, 6.0-servicing
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7
  • [Windows] Pending changes to correctly updating WinUI properties via resources #8193
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
